Thanks for the perfect upload.

Everything works perfect, the original game runs as it should, and the hi-res version with the proper 3D (i.e. no more 2D pixel enemies etc) is just gorgeous.

Also includes the level editor and a couple of extra maps thrown in for good measure. A class act all the way!
